Topic.Title: How do you make water drinkable

Posts.EditableText:
When the player finds some water and types in "drink water" he gets the message "you can't drink it". If there a way using the user interface to make the water drinkable?

Brian
Posts.HTML:
When the player finds some water and types in "drink water" he gets the message "you can't drink it". If there a way using the user interface to make the water drinkable?

Brian

Posts.EditableText: Drink is one of the default verbs. So on the water's 'Verbs' tab, add 'drink' and choose what you want it to do.
